channel.title: [317] Frozen Turmoil | 24/7 | Webclient | PK/Eco | Perfect Switching | Torva
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://frozenturmoil.com/forums/images/twilight/Logo%20-%20LeviBeck2.png[/img][/CENTER]
[b]Site:[/b] [url=http://frozenturmoil.com/]http://frozenturmoil.com/[/url] [color=black][b]Forums:[/b][/COLOR] [url=http://frozenturmoil.com/forums/]http://frozenturmoil.com/forums/[/url] [color=black][b]Webclient:[/b][/COLOR] [url=http://frozenturmoil.com/webclient/]http://frozenturmoil.com/webclient/[/url] [color=black][b]Vote:[/b][/COLOR] http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=frozenturmoil.no-ip.org
[color=black][b]Features[/b][/COLOR] - 24/7 uptime - Great staff team - Active community - Stable economy - Flawless switching (for your hybridding needs) - Working Lunar Spells (Vengeance) - Working Ancient Curses - Working Rigour + Augory - PvP + PKP System - Drop Parties hosted by the Staffs - Double XP events - Bank all items working - Constant updates/changes based on member's suggestions - Duel Arena
[color=black][b]NPCs[/b][/COLOR] - Corporeal Beast - Godwar Dungeons (Boss + Minions) - Bork - Dagannoth Kings - Barrows - Jad - Other non-boss NPCs: Ice Strykewyrm, Dark Beast, Aquanite, Jungle Strykewym, Desert Strykewym, Abyssal Demons, Experiments, etc.
[color=black][b]Items[/b][/COLOR] - Fully working Nex Armors (Torva, Pernix, Virtus) - Fully working spirit shields (Divine, Elysian, Arcane, Spectral) - Fully working korasi - Fully working hand cannon - Fully working dragon claws - Fully working PvP Weapons + Armor (Vesta, Statius, Morrigan, Zuriel) - Fully working dark bow - Chaotic weapons + shields - Arcane Stream Necklace - Dragon Defender - TokHaar-Kal Cape - Working Ring of Vigour
[color=black][b]Media[/b][/COLOR] [CENTER][IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4563/zgs.png[/img] [IMG]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/6108/zamorakw.png[/img] [IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/6572/vlsaa.png[/img] [IMG]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/331/venge.png[/img] [IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/7238/swh.png[/img] [IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/2254/31885601.png[/img] [IMG]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/7905/sgsl.png[/img] [IMG]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/4677/sarakx.png[/img] [IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/885/obelisk.png[/img] [IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/586/korasi.png[/img] [IMG]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/4404/jadn.png[/img] [IMG]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/9839/handcannong.png[/img] [IMG]http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/9332/duelarena.png[/img] [IMG]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/194/35365790.png[/img] [IMG]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/7189/barrowso.png[/img] [IMG]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/3531/bgsj.png[/img] [IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/5783/borkbr.png[/img] [IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/6130/corpv.png[/img] [IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/6029/cursesq.png[/img] [IMG]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/9383/dbow.png[/img] [IMG]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/4996/dclawsz.png[/img] [IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/8253/bandose.png[/img] [IMG]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/1316/armadylj.png[/img] [IMG]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/3247/ags.png[/img][/CENTER]
[color=black][b] Support Signatures[/b][/COLOR] Soon to come. If you would like to help out, send me a PM.
